TopicTitle: Wanna play KSP again after a while, KSP modded crash

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, i just wanted to start playing ksp again after a longer break.

now i grabbed a few mods and game is keeping crashing at me, checked

if versions are all up to date.

here is mod list:

KSP: 1.0.4 (Win32) - Unity: 4.6.4f1 - OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit

USI Tools - 0.4.2

Chatterer - 0.9.6.86

Community Resource Pack - 0.4.4

Deadly Reentry - 7.2.2

DMagic Orbital Science - 1.0.8

Ferram Aerospace Research - 0.15.5.1

Firespitter - 7.1.4

Interstellar Fuel Switch - 1.16

RasterPropMonitor - 0.22.2

Kerbal Attachment System - 0.5.4

Kerbal Engineer Redux - 1.0.18

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement - 3.1.4

HyperEdit - 1.4.1

KSP-AVC Plugin - 1.1.5

Infernal Robots - 0.21.3

Modular Rocket Systems - 1.7.3

ModularFlightIntegrator - 1.1.1

Docking Port Alignment Indicator - 6.2

Final Frontier - 0.8.6.1370

PlanetShine - 0.2.3.1

RCS Build Aid - 0.7.2

RemoteTech - 1.6.8

SmartParts - 1.6.6

TAC Fuel Balancer - 2.5.1.7

TextureReplacer - 2.4.10

TAC Life Support - 0.11.1.20

Kerbal Alarm Clock - 3.4

Alternate Resource Panel - 2.7.3

TweakScale - 2.2.1

USI Exploration Pack - 0.4.1

Freight Transport Tech - 0.4.1

Karbonite - 0.6.4

Karbonite Plus - 0.5

MKS - 0.31.10

here is crash dump:

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/42381812/2015-09-26_225618.rar

i've tried both x86 and x64 versions and both crash at same time

if you could give me any advice i would be very greatful!

regards,

alex

- - - Updated - - -

can be closed,

fixed it by downloading repos directly instead of realease versions for

https://github.com/BobPalmer/

mods!
